input.sentences: we toured the organization dealership to view their new model .
there was a lot of rear cargo space .
the car appeared to be very aerodynamic .
output.sentences: We got a view of shiny new car models as we toured the organization.
The new concept car looked futuristic with symbols and featured a new tech font on its dashboard gauges.
I loved the way it was spotless inside.
What appealed to me most is the space offered in its rear, vastly superior than other cars on the lot.
The spacious interior of the car seemed to contractict what appeared to be an aerodynamic exterior.
